task.title: Step 3. Distribute and Activate the StreamSets Parcel

context.p: Cloudera Managerdistribute and activate the parcelAfter you add the StreamSets repository to Cloudera Manager, you can download, distribute, and activate the StreamSets parcel across the cluster.

p.note: The StreamSets parcel repository is added to Cloudera Manager during the installation of the CSD. However, if installing the parcel before the CSD, the StreamSets parcel repository URL is located at: . Download the correct parcel type for the operating system that you use.

context.p: When working with multiple clusters, perform the following steps for each cluster.

step.cmd: To view the list of available parcels, in the menu bar, click the Parcels icon.
step.info: The StreamSets parcel displays in the list of available parcels. If it doesn't display, click Check for New Parcels.

step.cmd: To download the StreamSets parcel to the local repository, click Download.
step.info: After the parcel is downloaded, the Download button becomes the Distribute button.

step.cmd: To distribute the StreamSets parcel to the cluster, click Distribute.
step.info: After distribution, the Distribute button becomes the Activate button.

step.cmd: To activate the StreamSets parcel, click Activate.
